mobile.name: beholder
mobile.long_description: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
mobile.description: It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you to disintegrate you. Beholders are not known for their personality.

mobile.name: lamia beast
mobile.long_description: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
mobile.description: This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower body of a four-legged beast. She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

mobile.name: mimic chest
mobile.long_description: A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
mobile.description: A strong, wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy padlock on the front.

mobile.name: mimic boulder skeleton skeletons
mobile.long_description: Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.
mobile.description: This large boulder seems to have been dropped here at some point, since there aren't any boulders native to this area. The two skeletons beneath it are simply that, bones... no rags or anything else appears to be attached to them.

mobile.name: mimic floor
mobile.long_description: The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.
mobile.description: What a mess, you wonder to yourself what could have caused this rampant destruction.

mobile.name: mimic pottery shards
mobile.long_description: Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.
mobile.description: The pottery shards appear to have been part of a large vase at one point, probably before the city fell.

mobile.name: mimic planks wooden
mobile.long_description: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.
mobile.description: The fact that these planks still rest on this shelf leads you to believe that someone has been here before you...

mobile.name: lizard horned
mobile.long_description: A small horned lizard flicks his tongue and slithers away.
mobile.description: A cute little lizard -- that is, if you like reptiles!

mobile.name: golem stone
mobile.long_description: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
mobile.description: It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant stone creature. He stands here still guarding the city.

mobile.long_description: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
mobile.description: This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower body of a four-legged beast. She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.
